availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Reuben R. Jones (1860 Sheriff Meade Co)

body.p: Sheriff of Meade County, Kentucky. Kentucky native. Married Cora Lenora Jones. Father of Mary A. Jones, Cora Eveline Jones, Maria Louisa Jones, Samuel R. Jones, Kate Jones, William B. Jones, and Ida Jones. Sheriff of Meade County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, Unknown District, p. 124. Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1860 (Frankfort: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1861), 169.
